column4: For 64-bit why does it say "Not recommended for daily desktop usage?"
its a bit of misswording and being 'over cautious' - If you want to use it on a desktop machine go ahead. Many of us in here have been using it on the desktop for years
if you have 4+GB of ram - you want to use 64bit. If you do lots of video encoding./other cpu intensive tasks. You may want to use 64bit also
you cant install 64bit on a 32bit machine. :) You can do the reverse however.
